game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In this quest, you will embark on an adventure to find the long-lost treasure of a renowned pirate. Follow the clues, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges to locate the treasure and claim your reward!

task.description: Search the abandoned island for the ancient map that marks the location of the treasure.

task.objective: Solve the Riddle of the Sphinx
task.description: Travel to the desert and decipher the riddle posed by the Sphinx to proceed further in your quest.
Brave the haunted castle and retrieve the key that unlocks the treasure's secret chamber.
Navigate through the treacherous jungle to discover the entrance to the hidden cave where the treasure awaits.
Finally, reach the secret chamber and claim the long-lost treasure of Captain Blackbeard.
